newsitem.title: JAPAN: Matsushita sets up capacitor production firm in US.
newsitem.headline: Matsushita sets up capacitor production firm in US.

text.p: Matsushita Electric Industrial Co Ltd said on Wednesday that it and its wholly owned subsidiary Matsushita Industrial Equipment Co Ltd had set up a firm in the United States to make capacitors for electric equipment such as refrigerators and air conditioners.

The new firm, which was established in Illinois on October 1, is capitalised at $2.4 million and 60 percent held by Matsushita Industrial Equipment and the rest by Matsushita, the company said in a statement.
Production is expected to start next April, the statement said.
The new firm will have a production capacity of nine million units per year in 2002, it said.
